Round {roundNumber} Instructions

This round is the same as the previous rounds with one exception. You will be able to communicate with the other participants in your group during the round. To communicate, hit the enter key, type your message, and then hit the enter key again. You must hit the enter key before every message you type, otherwise control will return to the game screen where you can use the arrow keys to move around.

The length of this round is {duration}.

Do you have any questions? If you have any questions at this time please raise your hand and someone will come over to your station and answer it.
